scripts.build: esbuild src/main.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/Code.js --format=iife --global-name=_GasExports --target=es2020 --footer:js="function syncDriveToGcs(){return _GasExports.syncDriveToGcs()}function setupTrigger(){return _GasExports.setupTrigger()}function manualSync(){return _GasExports.manualSync()}function getConfig(){return _GasExports.getConfig()}function getAuthInfo(){return _GasExports.getAuthInfo()}"
